00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : VGrid
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021

00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE VGrid
00039 
00040 !  Common Variables
00041  USE Domain
00042  USE MPIParams
00043  USE MPI
00044  IMPLICIT NONE
00045 
00046 ! Local variables
00047  INTEGER :: complete, direction, partial, shift
00048  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, x, xeast, xwest, y, ynorth, ysouth, z, ztop, zbottom
00049  INTEGER, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: dims, mpi_coords
00050  LOGICAL, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: periodic
00051  LOGICAL :: reorder
00052 
00053 ! Initialize data for domain partitioning. Defaults are:
00054 ! Partitioning is periodic in all dimensions (periodic = .true.)
00055 ! CPUs are reordered in the grid for proximity (reorder = .true.)
00056  dims(1)     = mpi_xdim
00057  dims(2)     = mpi_ydim
00058  dims(3)     = mpi_zdim
00059  periodic(1) = .true.
00060  periodic(2) = .true.
00061  periodic(3) = .true.
00062  reorder     = .true.
00063 
00064 ! Create the new virtual connectivity grid
00065  CALL MPI_CART_CREATE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_dim, dims, periodic, reorder, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00066 
00067 ! Get this processor ID and coordinates within the virtual grid
00068  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, MPI_ERR)
00069  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00070  x = mpi_coords(1)
00071  y = mpi_coords(2)
00072  z = mpi_coords(3)
00073 
00074 !-------- Compute limits [ (xl,xu) x (yl,yu) x (zl,zu)] for this processor -----
00075 !  Partitioning in the x direction
00076  complete = (xmax - xmin) / dims(1)
00077  partial  = (xmax - xmin) - complete*dims(1)
00078  IF(mpi_coords(1) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00079    xl = xmin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(1)
00080    xu = xmin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) - 1
00081  ELSE
00082    xl = xmin + complete*mpi_coords(1) + partial
00083    xu = xmin + complete*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) + partial - 1
00084  END IF
00085  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(1) + 1,dims(1)) == 0) xu = xu + 1
00086 !  Partitioning in the y direction
00087  complete = (ymax - ymin) / dims(2)
00088  partial  = (ymax - ymin) - complete*dims(2)
00089  IF(mpi_coords(2) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00090    yl = ymin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(2)
00091    yu = ymin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) - 1
00092  ELSE
00093    yl = ymin + complete*mpi_coords(2) + partial
00094    yu = ymin + complete*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) + partial - 1
00095  END IF
00096  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(2) + 1,dims(2)) == 0) yu = yu + 1
00097 !  Partitioning in the y direction
00098  complete = (zmax - zmin) / dims(3)
00099  partial  = (zmax - zmin) - complete*dims(3)
00100  IF(mpi_coords(3) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00101    zl = zmin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(3)
00102    zu = zmin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(3) + 1) - 1
00103  ELSE
00104    zl = zmin + complete*mpi_coords(3) + partial
00105    zu = zmin + complete*(mpi_coords(3) + 1) + partial - 1
00106  END IF
00107  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(3) + 1,dims(3)) == 0) zu = zu + 1
00108 
00109 ! Modify limits to include ghost layers
00110  xlg = xl - 1
00111  xug = xu + 1
00112  ylg = yl - 1
00113  yug = yu + 1
00114  zlg = zl - 1
00115  zug = zu + 1
00116 
00117 !-------- Determine neighbours of this processor -------------------------------
00118 ! MPI_CART counts dimensions using 0-based arithmetic so that
00119 ! direction = 0 -> x  |  direction = 1 -> y  |  direction = 2 -> z
00120  shift     = 1
00121  direction = 0
00122  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, west, east, MPI_ERR)
00123  direction = 1
00124  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, south, north, MPI_ERR)
00125  direction = 2
00126  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, bot, top, MPI_ERR)
00127 
00128 !  Coordinates of the neighbours of this processor in the x, y, and z directions
00129  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, east, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00130  xeast = mpi_coords(1)
00131  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, west, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00132  xwest = mpi_coords(1)
00133  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, north, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00134  ynorth = mpi_coords(2)
00135  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, south, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00136  ysouth = mpi_coords(2)
00137  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, top, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00138  ztop = mpi_coords(3)
00139  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, bot, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00140  zbottom = mpi_coords(3)
00141 
00142 ! Get the ranks of the diagonal neighbours
00143 !  Neighbors along x edges
00144  mpi_coords(1) = x
00145  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00146  mpi_coords(3) = ztop
00147  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,tn,MPI_ERR)
00148  mpi_coords(1) = x
00149  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00150  mpi_coords(3) = ztop
00151  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,ts,MPI_ERR)
00152  mpi_coords(1) = x
00153  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00154  mpi_coords(3) = zbottom
00155  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,bs,MPI_ERR)
00156  mpi_coords(1) = x
00157  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00158  mpi_coords(3) = zbottom
00159  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,bn,MPI_ERR)
00160 
00161 !  Neighbors along y edges
00162  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00163  mpi_coords(2) = y
00164  mpi_coords(3) = ztop
00165  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,te,MPI_ERR)
00166  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00167  mpi_coords(2) = y
00168  mpi_coords(3) = ztop
00169  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,tw,MPI_ERR)
00170  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00171  mpi_coords(2) = y
00172  mpi_coords(3) = zbottom
00173  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,bw,MPI_ERR)
00174  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00175  mpi_coords(2) = y
00176  mpi_coords(3) = zbottom
00177  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,be,MPI_ERR)
00178 
00179 !  Neighbors along z edges
00180  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00181  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00182  mpi_coords(3) = z
00183  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,ne,MPI_ERR)
00184  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00185  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00186  mpi_coords(3) = z
00187  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,sw,MPI_ERR)
00188  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00189  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00190  mpi_coords(3) = z
00191  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,nw,MPI_ERR)
00192  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00193  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00194  mpi_coords(3) = z
00195  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,se,MPI_ERR)
00196 
00197  RETURN
00198  END SUBROUTINE VGrid
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:46 2008 for ZSC-3D-STD-MPI by  1.5.6
